text1: A standard destroyer of the Sampstonial Republic, it is decently light for it's armor and sports a decent array of weapon slots. Due to the built-in automated combat system, this ship requires less crew to operate. Though would probably do better fitted with a combat AI core.

Originally part of the Sampstonial Republic and it's exploratory fleet, it is now stranded remnants seeking to reconnect with the greater republic. Though this section of remnants mainly comprises of AI, it has secured itself a place without corruption.
